name: cloudwatchevents-processor
description: AWS Lambda function to collect CloudWatch events and post them to SumoLogic.
author: Himanshu Pal

scripts.test: cd guardduty && sam local invoke CloudWatchEventFunction -e event.json
scripts.build_guardduty: cd guardduty && sam package --template-file template.yaml --s3-bucket $SAM_S3_BUCKET  --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.deploy_guardduty: cd guardduty && sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name testingguarddutylambda --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides SumoEndpointUrl=$SUMO_ENDPOINT
scripts.build_zip: rm -f guardduty.zip && cd src && zip ../guardduty.zip cloudwatchevents.js && cd ..
